item.title: (server tut)Weapon img PLUS NAME! in choose attack style menu!
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“motherload11, post:1, topic:379”]well, you know theres a tut i posted on runestatus for weapon img in choose attack style menu but this time…IT SHOWS THE NAME!!!

find this in client.java:
outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); }
under that add this:

public void getCurrentWeapon(){ outStream.createFrame(71); if(isStaff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])){ outStream.writeWord(328);}else{ outStream.writeWord(2276);} outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(126); if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] <= 0){ //motherload11~~makes it unarmed outStream.writeString("Unarmed");}else{ //motherload11~~this checks if char isint wearing anything outStream.writeString(Item.itemName[playerEquipment[playerWeapon]]);} //motherload11~~ checks item name if(isStaff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])) { outStream.writeWordA(331);}else{ outStream.writeWordA(2279);} outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); outStream.createFrame(246); if(isStaff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])){ outStream.writeWordBigEndian(329);}else{ outStream.writeWordBigEndian(2277);} outStream.writeWord(200); outStream.writeWord(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);}see? code looks different doesint it eh?
either replace the old weapon img code with this or add it if you didint have the img code already!

now this part is for if you didint already have the image code!
find: public boolean process() // is being called regularily every 500ms
{(still in client.java lol)
under that finnal bracket ({) add this:

	getCurrentWeapon();

ok? and there ya go!

hope this helps ya guys out! lol[/quote]
Now u need the special attacks…got it? any idea?

Read full topic

item.title: (server tut)Weapon img PLUS NAME! in choose attack style menu!
item.dc:creator: @motherload11 motherload11
item.description:
@motherload11 wrote:

well, you know theres a tut i posted on runestatus for weapon img in choose attack style menu but this time…IT SHOWS THE NAME!!!

find this in client.java:
outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); }
under that add this:

public void getCurrentWeapon(){ outStream.createFrame(71); if(isStaff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])){ outStream.writeWord(328);}else{ outStream.writeWord(2276);} outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(126); if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] <= 0){ //motherload11~~makes it unarmed outStream.writeString("Unarmed");}else{ //motherload11~~this checks if char isint wearing anything outStream.writeString(Item.itemName[playerEquipment[playerWeapon]]);} //motherload11~~ checks item name if(isStaff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])) { outStream.writeWordA(331);}else{ outStream.writeWordA(2279);} outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); outStream.createFrame(246); if(isStaff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])){ outStream.writeWordBigEndian(329);}else{ outStream.writeWordBigEndian(2277);} outStream.writeWord(200); outStream.writeWord(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);}see? code looks different doesint it eh?
either replace the old weapon img code with this or add it if you didint have the img code already!

now this part is for if you didint already have the image code!
find: public boolean process() // is being called regularily every 500ms
{(still in client.java lol)
under that finnal bracket ({) add this:

	getCurrentWeapon();

ok? and there ya go!

hope this helps ya guys out! lol

Read full topic
